PlaceholderDesc_EarliestTime: Earliest time the event at which the event might happen.
PlaceholderDesc_LatestTime: Latest time the event at which the event might happen.
PlaceholderDesc_MovementTarget: Name of the movement target. null if none exist.
PlaceholderDesc_UnescapedMovementTarget: Name of the movement target. null if none exist. Escape setting will not be used here.
PlaceholderDesc_MovementTargetExportName: Export Name of the movement target
PlaceholderDesc_UnescapedMovementTargetE: Export Name of the movement target. null if none exist. Escape setting will not be used here.
PlaceholderDesc_MovementTargetExportName: Will be replaced with the export name of the movement target. If it has no export name the default name will be used. If both do not exist, this will be null.
PlaceholderDesc_UnescapedMovementTargetE: Will be replaced with the export name of the movement target. If it has no export name the default name will be used. If both do not exist, this will be null. Escape setting will not be used here.
PlaceholderDesc_ScriptType: Type of the script. Can be None, Code or NodeGraph sein.
PlaceholderDesc_TargetState: Target state of the npc upon arriving at the event target. null if no target state exists
PlaceholderDesc_IsEnabledByDefault: true if the event is enabled by default, else false.
